recipesJson.name: Strawberry Lemonade (restaurant style)
recipesJson.author: GObisco
recipesJson.description:
pulled from ELR 
http://e-liquid-recipes.com/recipe/68981/Strawberry%20Lemonade%20%28Restaurant%20Style%29

adjusted the ratios to make it a little less potent.  Refreshing.


*DEFINATELY SHAKE THIS RECIPE* I would even consider letting it breathe.
Shake before you drip... the PG& alcohol rise to the top and it gets nasty if not shaken properly.
